alert.note: Alert for Lampasas (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 4:42PM CDT until April 20 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lampasas County in central Texas... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 440 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near the Colorado Bend State Park, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Copperas Cove, Lampasas, Kempner, Colorado Bend State Park, Lometa, Izoro, Rumley, Adamsville and Nix. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
